waypoints.onload: if player.Race ~= 0 or player.Class2 == -1 then error("This waypoint file is for a dual classed Human character.",0) end if not __WPL.ResumePoint then local _NPC = player:findNearestNameOrId(110484) -- Find Laif Cindai near Pioneer's Colonyfor reference. if not (_NPC and 100 > distance(_NPC, player)) then error("Not at Human starting point in Howling Mountains!",0) end __WPL:setWaypointIndex(1) end
waypoints.waypoint: -- Need to be at least level 3 to accept the first quests, so let's farm some 'shrooms.. __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("NORMAL")
if player.Level > 4 then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end end

if player.Level > 4 then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Ready")) if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end else __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("LevelUpLoop")) end
player:target_NPC(110482) -- Leighton SureAcceptQuest(420077) -- Support Gyor's Task
player:target_NPC(110018) -- Avril SureAcceptQuest(420624) -- Drinking Lake Water
if getQuestStatus(420624) == "incomplete" then repeat player:target_Object(110093) -- Bucket for fetching water yrest(2000) until getQuestStatus(420624) == "complete" end player:mount()
player:target_NPC(110018) -- Avril SureCompleteQuest(420624) -- Drinking Lake Water SureAcceptQuest(420625) -- Filtering Carbon Stone
if getQuestStatus(420625) == "complete" then __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("FilteringCarbonStoneDone")) end

if getQuestStatus(420625) == "incomplete" then repeat player:target_Object(110095) -- Ore Stack yrest(2000) until getQuestStatus(420625) == "complete" end player:mount() __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)

player:target_NPC(110066) -- Gyor SureCompleteQuest(420077) -- Support Gyor's Task SureAcceptQuest(420458) -- Gil's New Miner SureAcceptQuest(420461) -- Thinning the Herd
__WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) if getQuestStatus(420458) == "complete" and getQuestStatus(420461) == "complete" then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Gil")) end

if getQuestStatus(420458) == "incomplete" then CatchMobSetup(100458, 99, 201167, 420458) cavecrab = player:findNearestNameOrId(100458) -- Red-pincer Cave Crab if cavecrab and 200 > distance(cavecrab, player) then player:moveInRange(CWaypoint(cavecrab.X, cavecrab.Z), 39, true) player:target(cavecrab) RoMCode("UseAction(1,1)") repeat inventory:useItem(201167) until getQuestStatus(420458) == "complete" or player.Battling == false end CatchMobSetup(0, 0, 0, 0) end
__WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)

player:target_NPC(110066) -- Gyor if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(420458, 1) -- Gil's New Miner player:update() inventory:useItem(222772) -- Crab Stompers elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then SureCompleteQuest(420458, 2) -- Gil's New Miner player:update() inventory:useItem(222773) -- Leather Protective Boots elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_KNIGHT or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN or player.Class1 == CLASS_CHAMPION then SureCompleteQuest(420458, 3) -- Gil's New Miner player:update() inventory:useItem(222774) -- Cave Crab War Boots end if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(420461, 1) -- Thinning the Herd elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE then SureCompleteQuest(420461, 1) -- Thinning the Herd player:update() inventory:useItem(222006) -- Miner's Belt elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_KNIGHT or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN or player.Class1 == CLASS_CHAMPION then SureCompleteQuest(420461, 2) -- Thinning the Herd player:update() inventory:useItem(222775) -- Miner's Chain Belt end SureAcceptQuest(420459) -- Lost Material SureAcceptQuest(420462) -- Goblin Warning
if getQuestStatus(420459) == "complete" then __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("LostMaterialDone")) end

player:target_Object(110485) -- Mine materials if getQuestStatus(420459) == "complete" then if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD) else __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) end

player:target_Object(110485) -- Mine materials if getQuestStatus(420459) == "complete" then if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD) end

player:target_NPC(110487) -- Maidge's Farmer ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SO_100459_1")) -- 'Was it you who forced Helen to sign the agreement?' ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SO_100459_2")) -- 'Give the contract to Mrs. Helen!'

player:target_NPC(110486) -- Mrs. Helen SureCompleteQuest(420464) -- Sold the Farm if player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_KNIGHT or player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT then inventory:useItem(211098) -- Sword of Peter's Remnants end player:mount()
player:target_NPC(110078) -- George SureAcceptQuest(420081) -- A Father's Distress

if getQuestStatus(420487) == "complete" then local Rey = player:findNearestNameOrId(110074) if Rey and 250 > distance(Rey, player) then player:target_NPC(110074) -- Rey SureCompleteQuest(420487) -- Hide and Seek SureAcceptQuest(420488) -- Where are you, Peter? end end

if getQuestStatus(420487) == "complete" then local Rey = player:findNearestNameOrId(110074) if not Rey or distance(Rey, player) > 200 then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Downstairs")) end else __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Downstairs")) end
player:dismount()

local Rey = player:findNearestNameOrId(110074) if Rey and 200 > distance(Rey, player) then player:target_NPC(110074) -- Rey SureCompleteQuest(420487) -- Hide and Seek SureAcceptQuest(420488) -- Where are you, Peter? end
if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end

if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end if not player.Mounted then -- Did not have a usable mount, so let's rent one. Treasure Hunt will need it! player:target_NPC(110782) -- Tex ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SO_MOUNTH_SHOP_AA")) -- 'Long term rent of a brown horse' local acceptCost = RoMScript("StaticPopup_Visible('SET_REQUESTDIALOG')") if acceptCost then RoMScript("StaticPopup_EnterPressed("..acceptCost..");") end yrest(2000) inventory:update() player:mount() end

-- Thus begins "Treasure Hunt" player:target_NPC(111622) -- Lola SureAcceptQuest(421531) -- Treasure Hunt player:target_NPC(111622) -- Lola ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_421531_1")) -- 'Please tell me the rules of the treasure hunt.' ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("HOUSE_MAID_LEAVE_TALK")) -- Leave conversation player:target_NPC(111622) -- Lola SureCompleteQuest(421531) -- Treasure Hunt SureAcceptQuest(421532) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 1 player:update() if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL")
if getQuestStatus(421532) == "complete" then __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Stage2")) end
if getQuestStatus(421532) == "incomplete" then __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") end

if getQuestStatus(421532) == "incomplete" then repeat player:target_Object(111623) -- Mysterious Mound until getQuestStatus(421532) == "complete" end player:mount() __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)

player:target_NPC(111622) -- Lola SureCompleteQuest(421532) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 1 inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222959) -- Treasure Hunter's Cape SureAcceptQuest(421533) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 2 __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN")
player:dismount() player:target_NPC(110500) -- Justin SureAcceptQuest(420490) -- Newt's Liquid
player:target_NPC(110499) -- Wooden chest SureCompleteQuest(420488) -- Where are you, Peter? SureAcceptQuest(420489) -- Rey's Toy

__WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) if inventory:itemTotalCount(203356) == 1 and getQuestStatus(421534) ~= "incomplete" then -- Locked Box / Key Making __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Justin")) end if (getQuestStatus(421534) == "incomplete" and inventory:itemTotalCount(203364) >= 12) and getQuestStatus(420489) == "complete" then -- (Key Making / Newt Saliva) and Rey's Toy __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("SalivaDone")) end
if getQuestStatus(420490) == "incomplete" and inventory:itemTotalCount(201186) ~= 5 then -- Newt's Liquid / Shadow Newt Fluid __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) end

if getQuestStatus(421533) == "incomplete" and inventory:itemTotalCount(203356) == 0 then -- Treasure Hunt, Stage 2 / Locked Box repeat player:target_Object(111624) -- Mysterious Mound until inventory:itemTotalCount(203356) == 1 end if getQuestStatus(420490) == "complete" then -- Newt's Liquid __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") player:mount() end if getQuestStatus(421534) == "incomplete" and inventory:itemTotalCount(203364) == 12 then -- Key Making __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") player:mount() end __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)

player:target_NPC(110500) -- Justin yrest(2000) ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_421534_1")) -- Are you Mr Pumpkin Head? yrest(2000) ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_421534_3")) -- Actually your hair looks better. yrest(2000) player:target_NPC(110500) -- Justin SureAcceptQuest(421534) -- Key Making SureCompleteQuest(420490) -- Newt's Liquid SureAcceptQuest(420491) -- Investigate the Moongorge __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("GetSaliva"))
__WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) if getQuestStatus(421534) == "complete" then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("UnlockBox")) end if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end

if inventory:itemTotalCount(203363) == 0 and inventory:itemTotalCount(203362) == 0 then -- No oil and no ore __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) elseif inventory:itemTotalCount(203363) == 1 and inventory:itemTotalCount(203362) == 0 then -- Oil but no ore __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("OilDone")) else -- Oil and ore collected __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD) end
player:target_NPC(111830) -- Mrs. Marian ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_421534")) -- Mrs. Marian, can you give me a bottle of your special oil? __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)
if getQuestStatus(421534) == "complete" then __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("SkipFarm")) end
if inventory:itemTotalCount(203362) ~= 2 then -- Abandoned Ore repeat yrest(2000) player:target_Object(111639) -- Abandoned Mine Pile until inventory:itemTotalCount(203362) == 2 end player:mount()

player:target_NPC(110482) -- Leighton SureCompleteQuest(420460) -- Warning if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST then inventory:update() inventory:useItem(211099) -- Cultivator's Staff end
__WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Warning"))

player:target_NPC(110500) -- Justin SureCompleteQuest(421534) -- Key Making inventory:update() inventory:useItem(203365) -- An Unlocked Chest SureAcceptQuest(421535) -- Spring Water from Moongorge SureCompleteQuest(420491) -- Investigating the Moongorge SureAcceptQuest(420492) -- The Moongorge Discovery
player:target_NPC(110499) -- Wooden chest SureCompleteQuest(420489) -- Rey's Toy

player:target_NPC(111622) -- Lola if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(421533,2) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 2 else SureCompleteQuest(421533,1) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 2 end SureCompleteQuest(421535) -- Spring Water from Moongorge SureAcceptQuest(421536) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 3

player:target_NPC(110060) -- Sharlin ChoiceOptionByName(getTEXT("SC_421536_1")) -- Lola has asked me to bring this healing spring water to you." SureCompleteQuest(420492) -- The Moongorge Discovery if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE then inventory:update() inventory:useItem(210349) -- Investigator's Short Wand inventory:useItem(222960) -- Children's Metal Ring end

-- Entrance to Dead Tree Cave if getQuestStatus(421536) == "complete" then -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 3 __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Stage3")) end if getQuestStatus(420067) == "complete" or getQuestStatus(420088) == "complete" then -- I've Got a Bad Feeling About This... / Destruction of the Gathering Magic __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("BadFeeling")) end
if getQuestStatus(420066) == "incomplete" then -- Dead Tree Cave Samples __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) end

if getQuestStatus(421536) == "incomplete" or getQuestStatus(420067) == "incomplete" or getQuestStatus(420088) == "incomplete" then -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 3 / I've Got a Bad Feeling About This... / Destruction of the Gathering Magic __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") end

if getQuestStatus(421536) == "incomplete" then repeat player:target_Object(111649) -- Mysterious Mound player:rest(2) until getQuestStatus(421536) == "complete" -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 3 end if getQuestStatus(420066) == "complete" then -- Dead Tree Cave Samples __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") player:mount() __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD) end if getQuestStatus(420088) == "complete" then -- Destruction of the Gathering Magic __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") inventory:update() inventory:useItem(200191) -- Logar's Skeleton RoMScript("AcceptBorderQuest()") -- Return of the Hero RoMScript("CloseAllWindows()") player:mount() end

if getQuestStatus(420067) == "incomplete" then -- I've Got a Bad Feeling About This... repeat inventory:useItem(200184) -- Magic Detection Crystal until getQuestStatus(420067) == "complete" __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") player:mount() end if getQuestStatus(420088) == "incomplete" then -- Destruction of the Gathering Magic player:rest(5,85,"full") repeat player:target_Object(110092) -- Magic Gathering Point until getQuestStatus(420088) == "complete" __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("NORMAL") player:rest(6) end __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)

player:target_NPC(111622) -- Lola if player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT or player.Class2 == CLASS_SCOUT then SureCompleteQuest(421536,1) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 3 inventory:update() inventory:useItem(211520) -- Silk Hunter's Bow elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST then SureCompleteQuest(421536,2) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 3 inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222961) -- Necklace of Dead Tree Energy (Magic Attack) elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR then SureCompleteQuest(421536,3) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 3 inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222962) -- Lola's Necklace (Strength) end SureAcceptQuest(421537) -- Water Dragon = Zanordoth __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN")

if getQuestStatus(420066) == "complete" then -- Dead Tree Cave Samples player:target_NPC(110051) -- Highly-skilled Doctor if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST then SureCompleteQuest(420066,1) inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222016) -- Wood Patterned Belt elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE or player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT then SureCompleteQuest(420066,2) inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222776) -- Grainy Leather Coat elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_KNIGHT then SureCompleteQuest(420066,3) inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222777) -- Grainy Defender Chainmail end yrest(8000) SureAcceptQuest(420067) -- I've Got a Bad Feeling About This... end if getQuestStatus(421537) == "complete" then __WPL:setDirection(WPT_FORWARD) __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("Zanordoth")) end
if getQuestStatus(421537) == "complete" then player:mount() __WPL:setForcedWaypointType("TRAVEL") end
yrest(2000) if getQuestStatus(421537) == "incomplete" then repeat player:target_Object(111816) -- Heart of the Spring until getQuestStatus(421537) == "complete" end __WPL:setDirection(WPT_BACKWARD)

__WPL:setForcedWaypointType("RUN") player:target_NPC(111622) -- Lola SureCompleteQuest(421537) -- Water Dragon = Zanordoth SureAcceptQuest(421538) -- Treasure Hunt - Stage 4 if not player.Mounted then player:mount() end
player:target_NPC(110599) -- Hinhus SureAcceptQuest(421669) -- Aymi is not food!

SureAcceptQuest(420086) -- Preparation end if getQuestStatus(420088) == "complete" then if player.Class1 == CLASS_MAGE or player.Class1 == CLASS_PRIEST or player.Class1 == CLASS_DRUID or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARLOCK then SureCompleteQuest(420088,1) -- Destruction of the Gathering Magic inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222013) -- Logar Soft Silk Boots elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_ROGUE or player.Class1 == CLASS_SCOUT then SureCompleteQuest(420088,2) -- Destruction of the Gathering Magic inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222014) -- Logar Leather Hunting Boots elseif player.Class1 == CLASS_WARRIOR or player.Class1 == CLASS_KNIGHT or player.Class1 == CLASS_WARDEN or player.Class1 == CLASS_CHAMPION then SureCompleteQuest(420088,3) -- Destruction of the Gathering Magic inventory:update() inventory:useItem(222015) -- Logar Guardian Battle Boots end __WPL:setWaypointIndex(__WPL:findWaypointTag("ReturnOfTheHero")) end
